## Case

### Patient
  - A 45 year-old woman with groin discomfort

### Clinical History
  - Lima-bean size mass in the right groin for 3 months
  - Fever
  - No weight loss

### Family History
  - None

--- 

## Case

### Medications
- None

### Physical Examination
- Bilateral lymphadenopathy and fullness in the right pelvic region. No hepatosplenomegaly.
